TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Interaction extends System.Object

summary.span: 模块包含用于与对象、应用程序和系统交互的过程。

span.span: The module contains procedures used to interact with objects, applications, and systems.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模块支持的 Visual Basic 语言关键字和运行时库成员，运行其他程序，调用方法或属性，从计算机发出提示音，提供的命令行字符串、 操作 COM 对象，并控制对话框。This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and run-time library members that run other programs, call a method or property, sound a beep from the computer, provide a command-line string, manipulate COM objects, and control dialog boxes. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`Shell`函数运行用户指定的应用程序。The following example uses the `Shell` function to run an application specified by the user. 指定为第二个参数将应用程序打开在正常大小，使其具有焦点。Specifying as the second argument opens the application in normal size and gives it the focus. ```vb Dim procID As Integer ' Run calculator. procID = Shell("C:\Windows\system32\calc.exe", AppWinStyle.NormalFocus) ' The preceding path is for Windows XP. ' The Windows 2000 path is C:\WINNT\system32\calc.exe. ```

summary.span: 激活已经正在运行的应用程序。

span.span: Activates an application that is already running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用`AppActivate`使应用程序的活动窗口成为焦点。You use `AppActivate` to bring an application's active window into focus. 不可能有一个句柄或向活动窗口的引用，或甚至知道哪个窗口在给定时刻处于活动状态。You might not have a handle or a reference to the active window, or even know which window is active at a given moment. 在这种情况下，不能使用方法。In such a case, you cannot use the method. `AppActivate`函数，将焦点更改到的命名应用程序或窗口，但不会影响是否是最大化或最小化。The `AppActivate` function changes the focus to the named application or window but does not affect whether it is maximized or minimized. 当用户执行某些操作来更改焦点或关闭窗口时，焦点将移走激活的应用程序窗口。Focus moves away from the activated application window when the user takes some action to change the focus or close the window. 可以使用`Shell`函数以启动应用程序并设置窗口样式。You can use the `Shell` function to start an application and set the window style. 如果您使用`Title`参数，`AppActivate`使用不区分大小写的比较，但要求的标题栏内容完全匹配。If you use the `Title` parameter, `AppActivate` uses a case-insensitive comparison but otherwise requires an exact match with the contents of the title bar. 它首先会查找顶级窗口，然后通过子窗口。It first looks through the top-level windows and then through the child windows. 如果它找不到匹配项，则会引发。If it cannot find a match, it throws an . 可以使用`AppActivate`仅与拥有 windows 的过程。You can use `AppActivate` only with processes that own windows. 大多数的控制台应用程序是否拥有的 windows，这意味着，它们不会在列表中会显示处理`AppActivate`搜索。Most console applications do not own windows, which means that they do not appear in the list of processes that `AppActivate` searches. 从一个控制台应用程序运行时，系统将创建单独的进程来运行应用程序，并将输出返回到控制台进程。When running from a console application, the system creates a separate process to run the application and returns the output to the console process. 因此，当你请求的当前进程 ID，你获得此单独的进程的进程 ID 而不是控制台应用程序的进程 id。Consequently, when you request the current process ID, you get the process ID of this separate process, rather than the console application's process ID. 在运行时，`AppActivate`函数会激活任何运行的应用程序具有与匹配标题`Title`或具有匹配的进程 ID `ProcessId`。At run time, the `AppActivate` function activates any running application with a title that matches `Title` or with a process ID that matches `ProcessId`. 如果没有完全匹配项，则会激活其标题字符串结尾的任何应用程序`Title`。If there is no exact match, it activates any application whose title string ends with `Title`. 如果没有名为多个应用程序`Title`，则`AppActivate`函数随机选择一个用于激活。If there is more than one application named `Title`, the `AppActivate` function arbitrarily chooses one to activate. > [!NOTE] > `AppActivate`函数需要`UIPermission`在级别，可能会影响在部分信任情况下执行。The `AppActivate` function requires `UIPermission` at the level, which may affect its execution in partial-trust situations. 有关更多信息，请参见。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例演示了的各种用法`AppActivate`函数以激活应用程序窗口。This example illustrates various uses of the `AppActivate` function to activate an application window. 如果未运行 Notepad 进程，则本示例引发。If a Notepad process is not running, the example throws an . `Shell`过程假设应用程序中指定的路径。The `Shell` procedure assumes the applications are in the paths specified. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#11)]

summary.span: 通过计算机扬声器提示音。

span.span: Sounds a tone through the computer's speaker.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 俯仰和提示音的持续时间取决于硬件和系统软件，因此有所不同的计算机。The pitch and duration of the beep depend on your hardware and system software and therefore vary among computers. > [!NOTE] > `Beep`函数需要`UIPermission`在级别，可能会影响在部分信任情况下执行。The `Beep` function requires `UIPermission` at the level, which may affect its execution in partial-trust situations. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 此示例使用 `Beep` 函数通过计算机的扬声器发出音调。This example uses the `Beep` function to sound a tone through the computer's speaker. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#59](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#59)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CallByName`函数用于在运行时获取的属性、 设置属性，或调用方法。The `CallByName` function is used at runtime to get a property, set a property, or invoke a method. ## Examples 在以下示例中，使用第一行`CallByName`若要设置`Text`属性的文本框中，第二行检索的值`Text`属性，并在第三个行调用`Move`方法来移动文本框。In the following example, the first line uses `CallByName` to set the `Text` property of a text box, the second line retrieves the value of the `Text` property, and the third line invokes the `Move` method to move the text box. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#99](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#99)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#20)] 下面的示例使用`CallByName`函数以调用`Add`和`Item`集合对象的方法。The next example uses the `CallByName` function to invoke the `Add` and `Item` methods of a collection object. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#21)]

summary.span: 从参数列表中选择和返回一个值。

span.span: Selects and returns a value from a list of arguments.

returns.span: 从参数列表中选择和返回一个值。

span.span: Selects and returns a value from a list of arguments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Choose`函数返回列表中传递的成员`Choice()`的值根据`Index`。The `Choose` function returns a member of the list passed in `Choice()`, based on the value of `Index`. 选择列表的第一个成员时`Index`为 1。The first member of the list is selected when `Index` is 1. 选择列表的最后一个成员时`Index`是`UBound`(`Choice()`)。The last member of the list is selected when `Index` is `UBound`(`Choice()`). 如果`Index`超出这些限制`Choose`返回`Nothing`。If `Index` is outside these limits, `Choose` returns `Nothing`. 如果`Index`不是整数，它正在计算之前四舍五入为最接近的整数。If `Index` is not a whole number, it is rounded to the nearest whole number before being evaluated. 可以使用`Choose`若要查找的值列表中的可能性。You can use `Choose` to look up a value in a list of possibilities. > [!NOTE] > 参数列表中的表达式可以包括函数调用。The expressions in the argument list can include function calls. 作为准备为调用的参数列表的一部分`Choose`，Visual Basic 编译器在每个表达式中调用的每个函数。As part of preparing the argument list for the call to `Choose`, the Visual Basic compiler calls every function in every expression. 这意味着您不能依赖于特定情况下选择了不同的表达式时未被调用函数`Index`。This means that you cannot rely on a particular function not being called if a different expression is selected by `Index`. ## Examples 此示例使用`Choose`函数来显示名称，以响应传递到过程中的索引`Ind`参数。This example uses the `Choose` function to display a name in response to an index passed into the procedure in the `Ind` parameter. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#22)]

span.span: Select...Case Statement (Visual Basic)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回参数后，您可以搜索常见分隔符，例如空格、 向前或向后斜杠、 连字符或引号中，拆分或搜索每个参数的字符串。After the arguments are returned, you can search for common delimiters, such as spaces, backward or forward slashes, hyphens, or quotation marks, to split or search the string for individual parameters. 有关使用 Visual Basic 开发和编译为.exe 文件，应用程序`Command`函数将返回命令行中，在此窗体上的应用程序的名称后显示的任何自变量： `MyApp(cmdlineargs)`。For applications developed with Visual Basic and compiled to an .exe file, the `Command` function returns any arguments that appear after the name of the application on the command line, in this form: `MyApp(cmdlineargs)`. ## Examples 此示例使用`Command`函数返回包含数组的对象的命令行参数。This example uses the `Command` function to return the command-line arguments in an object that contains an array. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#58](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#58)]

summary.span: 创建并返回对 COM 对象的引用。

span.span: Creates and returns a reference to a COM object.

summary.span: 不能在 Visual Basic 中使用 创建这些类的实例，除非将类显式公开为 COM 组件。

span.span: cannot be used to create instances of classes in Visual Basic unless those classes are explicitly exposed as COM components.

returns.span: 创建并返回对 COM 对象的引用。

span.span: Creates and returns a reference to a COM object.

returns.span: 不能在 Visual Basic 中使用 创建这些类的实例，除非将类显式公开为 COM 组件。

span.span: cannot be used to create instances of classes in Visual Basic unless those classes are explicitly exposed as COM components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建 COM 组件的实例，请将返回的对象分配`CreateObject`给对象变量：To create an instance of a COM component, assign the object returned by `CreateObject` to an object variable: ```vb Sub CreateADODB() Dim adoApp As Object adoApp = CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") End Sub ``` 用于存储返回的对象的对象变量的类型可能会影响应用程序的性能。The type of object variable you use to store the returned object can affect your application's performance. 声明对象变量与`As Object`子句创建的变量可以包含对任何类型的对象的引用。Declaring an object variable with the `As Object` clause creates a variable that can contain a reference to any type of object. 但是，对通过该变量的对象的访问是*后期绑定*，绑定，即发生在程序运行。However, access to the object through that variable is *late-bound*, that is, the binding occurs when your program runs. 有很多原因应避免后期绑定，包括应用程序性能下降。There are many reasons you should avoid late binding, including slower application performance. 你可以创建生成早期绑定对象变量，即，绑定时将编译该程序。You can create an object variable that results in early binding—that is, binding when the program is compiled. 为此，请添加对该对象的类型库的引用**COM**选项卡**添加引用**上的对话框**项目**菜单。To do so, add a reference to the type library for your object from the **COM** tab of the **Add Reference** dialog box on the **Project** menu. 然后，声明您的对象的特定类型的对象变量。Then declare the object variable of the specific type of your object. 在大多数情况下，它是使用更加高效`Dim`语句和主互操作程序集，以创建对象，它是使用比`CreateObject`函数。In most cases, it is more efficient to use the `Dim` statement and a primary interop assembly to create objects than it is to use the `CreateObject` function. ## 与非托管代码进行交互Interacting with Unmanaged Code 另一个问题是 COM 对象使用非托管的代码，代码而无需公共语言运行时的优势。Another issue is that COM objects use unmanaged code — code without the benefit of the common language runtime. 没有了一定程度的复杂性涉及混合与非托管代码的托管的代码的 Visual Basic 从 com。There is a fair degree of complexity involved in mixing the managed code of Visual Basic with unmanaged code from COM. 当添加对 COM 对象的引用时，Visual Basic 中搜索的主互操作程序集 (PIA) 的库;如果找到，则它使用它。When you add a reference to a COM object, Visual Basic searches for a primary interop assembly (PIA) for that library; if it finds one, then it uses it. 如果找不到 PIA，然后创建包含本地互操作性类为每个类的 COM 库中的互操作性程序集。If it does not find a PIA, then it creates an interoperability assembly that contains local interoperability classes for each class in the COM library. 有关详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 应用程序中的 COM 互操作性](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/com-interop/com-interoperability-in-net-framework-applications.md)。For more information, see [COM Interoperability in .NET Framework Applications](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/com-interop/com-interoperability-in-net-framework-applications.md). 通常应使用强绑定的对象和尽可能的主互操作程序集。You should generally use strongly bound objects and primary interop assemblies whenever possible. 使用下面的示例`CreateObject`函数中演示的 Microsoft Office 对象仅目的。The examples below use the `CreateObject` function with Microsoft Office objects for demonstration purposes only. 但是，这些对象是易于使用且更可靠，与相应的主互操作程序集一起使用时。However, these objects are easier to use and more reliable when used with the appropriate primary interop assembly. ## 在远程计算机上创建的对象Creating an Object on a Remote Computer 通过将传递到计算机的名称，可以在一台联网的远程计算机上创建对象`ServerName`自变量的`CreateObject`函数。You can create an object on a remote networked computer by passing the name of the computer to the `ServerName` argument of the `CreateObject` function. 该名称是共享名的计算机名称部分相同： 共享名为"\\\MyServer\Public，"`ServerName`是"MyServer"。That name is the same as the Machine Name portion of a share name: for a share named "\\\MyServer\Public," `ServerName` is "MyServer." > [!NOTE] > 请参阅 COM 文档 （请参阅 Microsoft Developer Network） 上对应用程序的可访问远程网络计算机上的其他信息。Refer to COM documentation (see Microsoft Developer Network) for additional information on making an application accessible on a remote networked computer. 您可能需要添加一个用于您的应用程序注册表项。You may need to add a registry key for your application. 以下代码将返回一个 Excel 的实例的版本号在名为的远程计算机上运行`MyServer`:The following code returns the version number of an instance of Excel running on a remote computer named `MyServer`: ```vb Sub CreateRemoteExcelObj() Dim xlApp As Object ' Replace string "\\MyServer" with name of the remote computer. xlApp = CreateObject("Excel.Application", "\\MyServer") MsgBox(xlApp.Version) End Sub ``` 如果远程服务器名称不正确，或如果它不可用，会发生运行时错误。If the remote server name is incorrect, or if it is unavailable, a run-time error occurs. > [!NOTE] > 使用`CreateObject`时没有对象的当前实例。Use `CreateObject` when there is no current instance of the object. 如果尚未运行对象的实例，启动的新实例，并创建指定类型的对象。If an instance of the object is already running, a new instance is started, and an object of the specified type is created. 若要使用的当前实例，或启动应用程序并将其加载的文件，请使用`GetObject`函数。To use the current instance, or to start the application and have it load a file, use the `GetObject` function. 如果对象已将自己注册为单实例对象，该对象的一个实例后，无论很多时候`CreateObject`执行。If an object has registered itself as a single-instance object, only one instance of the object is created, no matter how many times `CreateObject` is executed. ## 创建框架对象Creating Framework Objects 可以使用`CreateObject`函数只能用于创建 COM 对象。You can use the `CreateObject` function only to create a COM object. 虽然没有完全等效机制用于创建.NET Framework 对象，但在命名空间包含用于创建本地或远程对象的方法。While there is no exact equivalent mechanism for creating a .NET Framework object, the in the namespace contains methods to create local or remote objects. 具体而言，方法或方法可能会很有用。In particular, the method or the method might be useful. > [!IMPORTANT] > `CreateObject`函数需要非托管的代码的权限，这可能会影响在部分信任情况下执行。The `CreateObject` function requires unmanaged code permission, which might affect its execution in partial-trust situations. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[代码访问权限](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)。For more information, see and [Code Access Permissions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675). ## Examples 下面的示例使用`CreateObject`函数创建一个 Microsoft Excel 工作表，并将工作表保存到文件。The following example uses the `CreateObject` function to create a Microsoft Excel worksheet and saves the worksheet to a file. 若要使用此示例中，必须在运行此程序的计算机上安装 Excel。To use this example, Excel must be installed on the computer where this program runs. 此外，必须添加对从类型库的引用**COM**选项卡**添加引用**上的对话框**项目**菜单。Also, you must add a reference to the type library from the **COM** tab of the **Add Reference** dialog box on the **Project** menu. 类型库的名称各不相同，具体取决于您的计算机上安装的 Excel 的版本。The name of the type library varies depending on the version of Excel installed on your computer. 例如，名为的类型库的 Microsoft Excel 2002 **Microsoft Excel 10.0 对象库**。For example, the type library for Microsoft Excel 2002 is named **Microsoft Excel 10.0 Object Library**. [!code-vb[VbVbalrExcelObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrExcelObject/VB/Class1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未提供所有参数，则删除指定的设置。If all arguments are provided, the specified setting is deleted. 如果您尝试使用会发生运行时错误`DeleteSetting`上不存在节或键设置。A run-time error occurs if you attempt to use `DeleteSetting` on a nonexistent section or key setting. `DeleteSetting` 要求用户登录上将在操作由于`HKEY_LOCAL_USER`注册表项，直到用户以交互方式登录未处于活动状态。`DeleteSetting` requires that a user be logged on since it operates under the `HKEY_LOCAL_USER` registry key, which is not active until a user logs on interactively. 若要从非交互式进程 （如 Mtx.exe) 访问的注册表设置应存储在`HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\`或`HKEY_USER\DEFAULT\Software`注册表项。Registry settings that are to be accessed from a non-interactive process (such as Mtx.exe) should be stored under either the `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\` or the `HKEY_USER\DEFAULT\Software` registry keys. ## Examples 下面的示例首先使用`SaveSetting`过程来在 Windows 注册表中生成条目`MyApp`应用程序，然后使用`DeleteSetting`函数将其删除。The following example first uses the `SaveSetting` procedure to make entries in the Windows registry for the `MyApp` application, and then uses the `DeleteSetting` function to remove them. 因为没有`Key`指定参数，则整个`Startup`则将删除节，其中包括节名称和所有其密钥。Because no `Key` argument is specified, the whole `Startup` section is deleted, including the section name and all of its keys. span.span: Returns the string associated with an operating-system environment variable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`Expression`包含一个字符串，函数将返回分配给指定的环境字符串的文本-即，后面等号 （=） 为该环境变量的环境字符串表中的文本。If `Expression` contains a string, the function returns the text assigned to the specified environment string—that is, the text following the equal sign (=) in the environment-string table for that environment variable. 如果在字符串`Expression`无法找到在环境字符串表中，一个零长度字符串 ("") 返回。If the string in `Expression` cannot be found in the environment-string table, a zero-length string ("") is returned. 如果`Expression`包含一个整数，占用的环境字符串表中的数字位置返回的字符串。If `Expression` contains an integer, the string occupying that numeric position in the environment-string table is returned. 在这种情况下，返回所有文本，包括环境变量的名称。In this case, returns all of the text, including the name of the environment variable. 如果在指定位置中没有任何环境字符串返回长度为零的字符串。If there is no environment string in the specified position, returns a zero-length string. > [!IMPORTANT] > 函数需要环境的权限，这可能会影响在部分信任情况下执行。The function requires environment permission, which might affect its execution in partial-trust situations. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[代码访问权限](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)。For more information, see and [Code Access Permissions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675). ## Examples 此示例使用函数提供入口数目和长度的`PATH`环境字符串表中的语句。This example uses the function to supply the entry number and length of the `PATH` statement from the environment-string table. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#28)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `GetAllSettings` 返回未初始化`Object`如果任一`AppName`或`Section`不存在。`GetAllSettings` returns an uninitialized `Object` if either `AppName` or `Section` does not exist. 因为它将在操作`HKEY_LOCAL_USER`注册表项，该项未处于活动状态直至用户以交互方式登录，`GetAllSettings`要求用户进行登录。Because it operates under the `HKEY_LOCAL_USER` registry key, which is not active until a user logs on interactively, `GetAllSettings` requires that a user be logged on. 若要从非交互式进程 （如 Mtx.exe) 访问的注册表设置应存储在`HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\`或`HKEY_USER\DEFAULT\Software`注册表项。Registry settings that are to be accessed from a non-interactive process (such as Mtx.exe) should be stored under either the `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\` or the `HKEY_USER\DEFAULT\Software` registry keys. ## Examples 此示例首先使用`SaveSetting`函数来为指定的应用程序在 Windows 注册表中生成条目`AppName`，然后使用`GetAllSettings`函数以显示的设置。This example first uses the `SaveSetting` function to make entries in the Windows registry for the application specified as `AppName`, then uses the `GetAllSettings` function to display the settings. 请注意该应用程序名称和`Section`名称不能使用检索`GetAllSettings`。Note that application names and `Section` names cannot be retrieved with `GetAllSettings`. 最后，`DeleteSetting`函数会删除应用程序的条目。Finally, the `DeleteSetting` function removes the application's entries. span.span: Returns a reference to an object provided by a COM component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`GetObject`函数以从文件加载到 COM 组件的实例。Use the `GetObject` function to load an instance of a COM component from a file. 下面的示例阐释了这一点。The following example illustrates this. ```vb Dim CADObject As Object CADObject = GetObject("C:\CAD\schema.cad") ``` 当此代码运行时，指定关联的应用程序`PathName`启动和激活指定的文件中的对象。When this code runs, the application associated with the specified `PathName` is started and the object in the specified file is activated. ## 默认情况下Default Cases 如果`PathName`是一个零长度字符串 (`""`)，`GetObject`返回指定的类类型的新对象实例。If `PathName` is a zero-length string (`""`), `GetObject` returns a new object instance of the specified class type. 如果`PathName`省略参数，则`GetObject`返回当前处于活动状态中指定的类类型的对象`Class`。If the `PathName` argument is omitted, `GetObject` returns a currently active object of the class type specified in `Class`. 如果不存在的对象的指定类型，就会出错。If no object of the specified type exists, an error occurs. ## 访问子对象Accessing a Subobject 某些应用程序允许您激活与文件关联的子对象。Some applications allow you to activate a subobject associated with a file. 若要执行此操作，将添加一个感叹号 (`!`) 到末尾的文件的名称并遵循其标识文件的一部分的字符串与你想要激活。To do this, add an exclamation point (`!`) to the end of the file name and follow it with a string that identifies the part of the file you want to activate. 有关如何创建此字符串的信息，请参阅创建对象的应用程序的文档。For information on how to create this string, see the documentation for the application that created the object. 例如，一个绘图应用程序中可能具有多个层在文件中存储的图形。For example, in a drawing application you might have multiple layers to a drawing stored in a file. 可以使用以下代码以激活调用`schema.cad`。You could use the following code to activate a layer within a drawing called `schema.cad`. ```vb layerObject = GetObject("C:\CAD\schema.cad!Layer3") ``` ## 指定某个类Specifying a Class 如果未指定对象的`Class`，自动化确定启动和对象的应用程序，若要激活，基于所提供的文件名称。If you do not specify the object's `Class`, Automation determines the application to start and the object to activate, based on the file name you provide. 但是，一些文件，可以支持多个对象的类。Some files, however, can support more than one class of object. 例如，绘图可能支持三种不同类型的对象：`Application`对象，`Drawing`对象，和一个`Toolbar`对象，所有这些都是相同的文件的一部分。For example, a drawing might support three different types of objects: an `Application` object, a `Drawing` object, and a `Toolbar` object, all of which are part of the same file. 若要指定想要激活的对象文件中，使用可选`Class`参数。To specify which object in a file you want to activate, use the optional `Class` argument. 下面的示例阐释了这一点。The following example illustrates this. ```vb Dim drawObj As Object drawObj = GetObject("C:\Drawings\sample.drw", "Figment.Drawing") ``` 在前面的示例中，`Figment`是一个绘图应用程序的名称和`Drawing`是它支持的对象类型之一。In the preceding example, `Figment` is the name of a drawing application and `Drawing` is one of the object types it supports. ## 使用对象Using the Object 一旦激活一个对象，则引用它在代码中使用对象变量声明。Once an object is activated, you refer to it in code using the object variable you declared. 在前面的示例中，您可以访问使用对象变量的新对象的属性和方法`drawObj`。In the preceding example, you access properties and methods of the new object using the object variable `drawObj`. 下面的示例阐释了这一点。The following example illustrates this. ```vb drawObj.Line(9, 90) drawObj.InsertText(9, 100, "Hello, world.") drawObj.SaveAs("C:\Drawings\sample.drw") ``` > [!NOTE] > 使用`GetObject`函数对象的当前实例时，或者如果你想要使用已加载的文件创建对象。Use the `GetObject` function when there is a current instance of the object or if you want to create the object with a file loaded. 如果没有当前实例，并且您不希望开始使用的对象加载的文件，请使用函数。If there is no current instance, and you do not want the object started with a file loaded, use the function. > > 如果对象已将自己注册为 ActiveX 单实例对象，该对象的一个实例后，无论很多时候`CreateObject`调用。If an object has registered itself as an ActiveX single-instance object, only one instance of the object is created, no matter how many times `CreateObject` is called. 与单实例对象，`GetObject`始终返回同一实例时使用长度为零的字符串调用 (`""`) 的语法，它会导致错误如果`PathName`省略参数。With a single-instance object, `GetObject` always returns the same instance when called with the zero-length string (`""`) syntax, and it causes an error if the `PathName` argument is omitted. 不能使用`GetObject`以获取对使用 Visual Basic 创建的类的引用。You cannot use `GetObject` to obtain a reference to a class created with Visual Basic. > [!IMPORTANT] > `GetObject`函数需要非托管的代码的权限，这可能会影响在部分信任情况下执行。The `GetObject` function requires unmanaged code permission, which might affect its execution in partial-trust situations. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[代码访问权限](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)。For more information, see and [Code Access Permissions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675). ## Examples 下面的示例使用`GetObject`函数获取对特定的 Microsoft Excel 工作表的引用 (`excelObj`)。The following example uses the `GetObject` function to obtain a reference to a specific Microsoft Excel worksheet (`excelObj`). 它使用工作表的`Application`属性让 Excel 显示出来，以关闭它，并执行其他操作。It uses the worksheet's `Application` property to make Excel visible, to close it, and to perform other actions. 使用两个 API 调用，`detectExcel`过程查找 Excel，且如果它正在运行，将进入它在运行对象表中。Using two API calls, the `detectExcel` procedure looks for Excel, and if it is running, enters it in the Running Object table. 首次调用`GetObject`会导致错误，如果 Excel 尚未运行，在此示例会导致`excelWasNotRunning`标志设置为`True`。The first call to `GetObject` causes an error if Excel is not already running, which in this example causes the `excelWasNotRunning` flag to be set to `True`. 第二次调用`GetObject`指定要打开的文件。The second call to `GetObject` specifies a file to open. 如果尚未运行 Excel，第二次调用启动外接程序，并返回到指定的文件，由表示工作表的引用`test.xls`。If Excel is not already running, the second call starts it and returns a reference to the worksheet represented by the specified file, `test.xls`. 该文件必须存在于指定位置;否则，Visual Basic 将引发。The file must exist in the specified location; otherwise, Visual Basic throws a . 接下来，示例代码会使 Excel 和包含指定的工作表可见的窗口。Next, the example code makes both Excel and the window containing the specified worksheet visible. 此示例需要`Option Strict Off`因为它使用后期绑定，其中对象分配给类型的变量`Object`。This example requires `Option Strict Off` because it uses late binding, where objects are assigned to variables of type `Object`. 您可以指定`Option Strict On`，并声明特定对象类型的对象，如果添加对从 Excel 类型库的引用**COM**选项卡**添加引用**对话框中的**项目**Visual Studio 菜单中的。You can specify `Option Strict On` and declare objects of specific object types if you add a reference to the Excel type library from the **COM** tab of the **Add Reference** dialog box of the **Project** menu in Visual Studio. [!code-vb[VbVbalrExcelObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrExcelObject/VB/Class1.vb#2)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrExcelObject#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrExcelObject/VB/Class1.vb#4)] [!code-vb[VbVbalrExcelObject#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrExcelObject/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 当您调用`getExcel`函数，则进行检查以查看是否已运行 Excel。When you call the `getExcel` function, a check is made to see if Excel is already running. 如果不是这样，被创建实例。If it is not, then an instance is created. > [!IMPORTANT] > 为简单起见，前面的示例假定任何窗口调用`XLMAIN`属于 Microsoft Excel 的实例。For simplicity, the preceding example assumes that any window called `XLMAIN` belongs to an instance of Microsoft Excel. 如果另一个对象，可能是由非法篡改启动具有该名称创建一个窗口，它将接收适用于 Excel 的所有消息。If another object, possibly launched by illicit tampering, created a window with that name, it would receive all the messages you intended for Excel. 在用于生产的应用程序，应包括一些更严格测试，以验证`XLMAIN`确实属于 Excel。In an application to be used for production, you should include some more rigorous testing to verify that `XLMAIN` really belongs to Excel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在任何一项名为`GetSetting`自变量不存在，`GetSetting`返回的值为`Default`。If any of the items named in the `GetSetting` arguments do not exist, `GetSetting` returns a value of `Default`. 因为它将在操作`HKEY_LOCAL_USER`注册表项，该项未处于活动状态直至用户以交互方式登录，`GetSetting`要求用户进行登录。Because it operates under the `HKEY_LOCAL_USER` registry key, which is not active until a user logs on interactively, `GetSetting` requires that a user be logged on. 若要从非交互式进程 （如 Mtx.exe) 访问的注册表设置应存储在`HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\`或`HKEY_USER\DEFAULT\Software`注册表项。Registry settings that are to be accessed from a non-interactive process (such as Mtx.exe) should be stored under either the `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\` or the `HKEY_USER\DEFAULT\Software` registry keys. `GetSetting` 需要`Read` 。`GetSetting` requires `Read` . ## Examples 此示例首先使用`SaveSetting`函数来为指定的应用程序在 Windows 注册表中生成条目`AppName`，然后使用`GetSetting`函数以显示设置之一。This example first uses the `SaveSetting` function to make entries in the Windows registry for the application specified as `AppName`, and then uses the `GetSetting` function to display one of the settings. 因为`Default`指定参数，则某些保证值返回。Because the `Default` argument is specified, some value is guaranteed to be returned. 请注意，`Section`名称不能使用检索`GetSetting`。Notice that `Section` names cannot be retrieved with `GetSetting`. 最后，`DeleteSetting`函数会删除应用程序的所有条目。Finally, the `DeleteSetting` function removes all the application's entries. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#61](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#61)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IIf`函数提供了对应的三元[条件运算符:？:](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88643ee8-7100-4f86-880a-705ec22b6271) Visual c + +。The `IIf` function provides a counterpart for the ternary [Conditional Operator: ? :](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88643ee8-7100-4f86-880a-705ec22b6271) in Visual C++. ## Examples 此示例使用`IIf`函数来计算`testMe`参数的`checkIt`过程并返回单词"大型"if 金额大于 1000年; 否则，它返回单词"小"。This example uses the `IIf` function to evaluate the `testMe` parameter of the `checkIt` procedure and returns the word "Large" if the amount is greater than 1000; otherwise, it returns the word "Small". [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#33](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#33)] 请注意，如果`Option Strict`是`On`，则必须使用`CStr`关键字的返回值显式转换`Object`到`String`。Note that if `Option Strict` is `On`, you must use the `CStr` keyword to explicitly convert the return from `Object` to `String`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用户单击**取消**，则返回长度为零的字符串。If the user clicks **Cancel**, a zero-length string is returned. 若要指定多个第一个参数，必须使用`InputBox`在表达式中的函数。To specify more than the first argument, you must use the `InputBox` function in an expression. 如果省略任何位置实参，你必须保留相应的逗号分隔符。If you omit any positional arguments, you must retain the corresponding comma delimiter. > [!NOTE] > `InputBox`函数需要`UIPermission`在级别，可能会影响在部分信任情况下执行。The `InputBox` function requires `UIPermission` at the level, which may affect its execution in partial-trust situations. 有关详细信息，请参阅和。For more information, see and . ## Examples 此示例演示各种方法来使用`InputBox`函数来提示用户输入的值。This example shows various ways to use the `InputBox` function to prompt the user to enter a value. 如果 x 和 y 位置省略、 各自的轴自动居中显示对话框。If the x and y positions are omitted, the dialog box is automatically centered for the respective axes. 该变量`MyValue`包含由用户输入，如果用户单击确定或按 ENTER 键的值。The variable `MyValue` contains the value entered by the user if the user clicks OK or presses the ENTER key. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果省略任何位置实参，你必须保留相应的逗号分隔符。If you omit any positional arguments, you must retain the corresponding comma delimiter. 如果对话框显示**取消**按钮，则按 ESC 键具有相同的效果与单击**取消**If the dialog box displays a **Cancel** button, pressing the ESC key has the same effect as clicking **Cancel** 如果对话框包含**帮助**按钮，为对话框提供上下文相关帮助。If the dialog box contains a **Help** button, context-sensitive Help is provided for the dialog box. 但是，在关闭其他任一按钮前，不会返回任何值。However, no value is returned until one of the other buttons is chosen. 在 Windows 窗体应用程序中，选择**帮助**按钮执行窗体的事件。In Windows Form applications, choosing the **Help** button executes the event for the form. > [!NOTE] > `MsgBox`函数需要`UIPermission`在级别，可能会影响在部分信任情况下执行。The `MsgBox` function requires `UIPermission` at the level, which may affect its execution in partial-trust situations. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . `MsgBoxStyle`下表列出了枚举值。The `MsgBoxStyle` enumeration values are listed in the following table. |成员Member|“值”Value|描述Description| |-|-|-| |成员Member|“值”Value|描述Description| |`OKOnly`|00|仅显示确定按钮。Displays OK button only.| |`OKCancel`|11|显示确定和取消按钮。Displays OK and Cancel buttons.| |`AbortRetryIgnore`|22|显示中止、 重试，和忽略按钮。Displays Abort, Retry, and Ignore buttons.| |`YesNoCancel`|33|显示是、 否和取消按钮。Displays Yes, No, and Cancel buttons.| |`YesNo`|44|显示是和无按钮。Displays Yes and No buttons.| |`RetryCancel`|55|显示重试和取消按钮。Displays Retry and Cancel buttons.| |`Critical`|1616|显示关键消息图标。Displays Critical Message icon.| |`Question`|3232|显示警告查询图标。Displays Warning Query icon.| |`Exclamation`|4848|显示警告消息图标。Displays Warning Message icon.| |`Information`|6464|显示信息性消息图标。Displays Information Message icon.| |`DefaultButton1`|00|第一个按钮是默认值。First button is default.| |`DefaultButton2`|256256|第二个按钮是默认值。Second button is default.| |`DefaultButton3`|512512|第三个按钮是默认值。Third button is default.| |`ApplicationModal`|00|应用程序是模式化。Application is modal. 用户必须响应消息框，才能继续在当前应用程序中工作。The user must respond to the message box before continuing work in the current application.| |`SystemModal`|40964096|系统为模式。System is modal. 所有应用程序挂起，直到用户响应消息框。All applications are suspended until the user responds to the message box.| |`MsgBoxSetForeground`|6553665536|指定消息框窗口作为前台窗口。Specifies the message box window as the foreground window.| |`MsgBoxRight`|524288524288|文本是右对齐。Text is right-aligned.| |`MsgBoxRtlReading`|10485761048576|指定文本应显示为右到左读取希伯来语和阿拉伯语系统上。Specifies text should appear as right-to-left reading on Hebrew and Arabic systems.| 第一组值 (0 – 5) 描述的数量和类型显示在对话框中的按钮。The first group of values (0–5) describes the number and type of buttons displayed in the dialog box. 第二个组 （16、 32、 48、 64） 描述图标样式。The second group (16, 32, 48, 64) describes the icon style. 第三个组 （0、 256、 512） 确定哪个按钮是默认值。The third group (0, 256, 512) determines which button is the default. 第四个组 （0，4096） 确定的消息框中，模式和第五个组指定消息框窗口是前台窗口，以及对齐和中文本的方向。The fourth group (0, 4096) determines the modality of the message box, and the fifth group specifies whether or not the message box window is the foreground window, along with the alignment and direction of the text. 当添加数字以创建为一个最终值`Buttons`参数，使用每个组中只有一个数字。When adding numbers to create a final value for the `Buttons` argument, use only one number from each group. ## Examples 此示例使用`MsgBox`函数具有是和无按钮的对话框中显示的严重错误消息。This example uses the `MsgBox` function to display a critical-error message in a dialog box with Yes and No buttons. 否按钮指定为默认响应。The No button is specified as the default response. 这是通过组合`MsgBox`到一个数值表达式的常量值。This is done by combining the `MsgBox` constant values into one numeric expression. 在这种情况下，加上 4 (是/否按钮组合) 和 16 (**关键消息**窗口) 和 256 （作为默认按钮的第二个按钮） 得到的 276 总计。In this case, adding 4 (the Yes/No button combination) and 16 (the **Critical Message** window) and 256 (the second button as default button) gives a total of 276. 返回的值`MsgBox`函数取决于用户选择的按钮: 是返回的值为 6;没有返回一个值为 7。The value returned by the `MsgBox` function depends on the button chosen by the user: Yes returns a value of 6; No returns a value of 7. returns.span: 返回一个字符串，该字符串表示包含某个数字的计算范围。

span.span: Returns a string representing the calculated range that contains a number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Partition`函数计算的一组数值范围，每个都包含由指定的值的数目`Interval`。The `Partition` function calculates a set of numeric ranges, each containing the number of values specified by `Interval`. 第一个范围开始处`Start`，并最后一个范围结束于`Stop`。The first range begins at `Start`, and the last range ends at `Stop`. `Partition`函数然后确定哪一个范围包含`Number`，并返回一个描述该范围内的字符串。The `Partition` function then identifies which range contains `Number` and returns a string describing that range. 范围表示为字符串中"*较*:*值*"，其中范围的低端 (*较*) 分开的高端 (*值*) 一个冒号 （:）。The range is represented in the string as "*lowervalue*:*uppervalue*", where the low end of the range (*lowervalue*) is separated from the high end (*uppervalue*) by a colon (:). 如果有必要，请`Partition`函数将插入前的前导空格*较*并*值*，以便它们都具有相同数量的字符的值 （以字符串表示形式`Stop` + 1)。If necessary, the `Partition` function inserts leading spaces before *lowervalue* and *uppervalue* so that they both have the same number of characters as the string representation of the value (`Stop` + 1). 这可确保，如果使用的输出`Partition`函数中的多个值`Number`，生成的文本都可以正确处理任何后续排序操作过程。This ensures that if you use the output of the `Partition` function with several values of `Number`, the resulting text will be handled properly during any subsequent sort operation. 下表显示了使用三组计算的范围某些示例字符串`Start`， `Stop`，和`Interval`。The following table shows some sample strings for ranges calculated using three sets of `Start`, `Stop`, and `Interval`. "第一个范围"和"最后一个范围"列显示在给定的值时可能的最低和最高范围`Start`和`Stop`。The "First range" and "Last range" columns show the lowest and highest ranges possible given the values of `Start` and `Stop`. "之前第一个范围"和"之后，最后一个范围"列显示返回的值的字符串`Number`少于`Start`且大于`Stop`分别。The "Before first range" and "After last range" columns show the strings returned for values of `Number` less than `Start` and greater than `Stop`, respectively. |`Start`|`Stop`|`Interval`|第一个范围之前Before first range|第一个范围First range|最后一个范围Last range|最后一个范围之后After last range| |-|-|-|-|-|-|-| |00|9999|55|" : -1"" : -1"|"0: 4"" 0: 4"|"95: 99"" 95: 99"|"100:""100: "| |2020|199199|1010|": 19 英寸" : 19"|"20: 29"" 20: 29"|"190:199""190:199"|"200:""200: "| |100100|10101010|2020|": 99"" : 99"|"100: 119"" 100: 119"|"1000:1010""1000:1010"|"1011年:""1011: "| 在上表中，第三行显示结果时`Start`并`Stop`定义一组不能通过平均划分的数字`Interval`。In the preceding table, the third line shows the result when `Start` and `Stop` define a set of numbers that cannot be evenly divided by `Interval`. 最后一个范围结束于`Stop`，使其仅有 11 个字符，即使`Interval`为 20。The last range ends at `Stop`, making it only 11 numbers long, even though `Interval` is 20. 如果`Interval`为 1，范围是"`Number`:`Number`"，则无论什么`Start`和`Stop`参数。If `Interval` is 1, the range is "`Number`:`Number`", regardless of the `Start` and `Stop` arguments. 例如，如果`Number`是 267，`Stop`为 1000，并`Interval`为 1，`Partition`返回"267: 267"。For example, if `Number` is 267, `Stop` is 1000, and `Interval` is 1, `Partition` returns " 267: 267". `Partition` 构建数据库查询时，可以很有用。`Partition` can be useful when constructing database queries. 可以创建显示订单数，例如用发票值从 1 到 1000，各种值范围内发生 1001年到 2000年等等的 SELECT 查询。You can create a SELECT query that shows how many orders occur within various value ranges, for example with invoice values from 1 to 1000, 1001 to 2000, and so on. ## Examples 下面的示例设置范围的一系列几十年来从通过 2049年 1950 年。The following example sets up a series of ranges for decades from 1950 through 2049. 它查找的值`year`内的适当的范围和返回`String`显示范围的值。It locates the value of `year` within the appropriate range and returns a `String` value showing the range. 如果`year`的值为 1984，例如，`Partition`返回"1980: 1989"。If `year` has a value of 1984, for example, `Partition` returns "1980:1989". [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#45](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#45)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `SaveSetting`函数将添加到密钥`HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\VB and VBA Program Settings`。The `SaveSetting` function adds the key to `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\VB and VBA Program Settings`. 如果出于任何原因而无法保存项设置，将会出错。If the key setting cannot be saved for any reason, an error occurs. `SaveSetting` 要求用户登录上将在操作由于`HKEY_LOCAL_USER`注册表项，直到用户以交互方式登录未处于活动状态。`SaveSetting` requires that a user be logged on since it operates under the `HKEY_LOCAL_USER` registry key, which is not active until a user logs on interactively. 若要从非交互式进程 （如 Mtx.exe) 访问的注册表设置应存储在`HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\`或`HKEY_USER\DEFAULT\Software`注册表项。Registry settings that are to be accessed from a non-interactive process (such as Mtx.exe) should be stored under either the `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\` or the `HKEY_USER\DEFAULT\Software` registry keys. `SaveSetting` 需要`Write`并`Create` 。`SaveSetting` requires `Write` and `Create` . ## Examples 下面的示例首先使用`SaveSetting`函数来在 Windows 注册表中生成条目`MyApp`应用程序，然后使用`DeleteSetting`函数将其删除。The following example first uses the `SaveSetting` function to make entries in the Windows registry for the `MyApp` application, and then uses the `DeleteSetting` function to remove them. summary.span: 运行一个可执行程序，并且如果该程序仍在运行则返回一个包含该程序的进程 ID 的整数。

span.span: Runs an executable program and returns an integer containing the program's process ID if it is still running.

returns.span: 运行一个可执行程序，并且如果该程序仍在运行则返回一个包含该程序的进程 ID 的整数。

span.span: Runs an executable program and returns an integer containing the program's process ID if it is still running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回值`Shell`函数取决于程序是否在名为`PathName`仍在执行时`Shell`返回。The return value of the `Shell` function depends on whether the program named in `PathName` is still executing when `Shell` returns. 如果您设置`Wait`到`True`并在程序完成之前超时到期，`Shell`返回零。If you set `Wait` to `True` and the program finishes before the timeout expires, `Shell` returns zero. 如果在超时到期，或省略`Wait`或将其设置为`False`，`Shell`返回该程序的进程 ID。If the timeout expires, or if you omit `Wait` or set it to `False`, `Shell` returns the process ID of the program. 进程 ID 是标识正在运行的程序的唯一编号。The process ID is a unique number that identifies the running program. ## 启动失败Failure to Start 如果`Shell`函数不能启动指定的程序，发生错误。If the `Shell` function cannot start the named program, a error occurs. 可以这样做，例如，当您尝试运行 16 位程序，如`command.com`，从应用程序中使用。This can happen, for example, when you attempt to run a 16-bit program, such as `command.com`, from an application using . 有关解决方法，可以运行调用所需的 16 位程序的 32 位程序。For a workaround, you can run a 32-bit program that calls the desired 16-bit program. 情况下`command.com`，可以运行`cmd.exe`作为替代方法。In the case of `command.com`, you can run `cmd.exe` as an alternative. ## 等待完成Waiting for Completion 默认情况下，`Shell`函数以异步方式运行该程序。By default, the `Shell` function runs the program asynchronously. 这意味着程序入门`Shell`函数可能无法完成执行之后的语句之前`Shell`函数执行的。This means that a program started with the `Shell` function might not finish executing before the statements following the `Shell` function are executed. 如果你想要等待计划完成，然后您再继续，请设置`Wait`到`True`。If you want to wait for the program to finish before you continue, set `Wait` to `True`. ## 确定退出代码Determining the Exit Code 一个过程可以返回*退出代码*终止时。A process can return an *exit code* when it terminates. 但是，不能使用`Shell`来检索此退出代码，因为`Shell`如果等待终止，则返回零，也因为进程运行在不同的对象中`Shell`。However, you cannot use `Shell` to retrieve this exit code, because `Shell` returns zero if it waits for termination, and also because the process runs in a different object from `Shell`. 若要检索从进程的退出代码，必须编写您自己的代码以启动过程并等待终止。To retrieve the exit code from a process, you must write your own code to initiate the process and wait for termination. 下面的示例演示如何启动过程，等待其终止，并检索其退出代码。The following example shows how to initiate a process, wait for it to terminate, and retrieve its exit code. ```vb Dim procID As Integer Dim newProc As Diagnostics.Process newProc = Diagnostics.Process.Start("C:\WINDOWS\NOTEPAD.EXE") procID = newProc.Id newProc.WaitForExit() Dim procEC As Integer = -1 If newProc.HasExited Then procEC = newProc.ExitCode End If MsgBox("Process with ID " & CStr(ProcID) & _ " terminated with exit code " & CStr(procEC)) ``` ## 保护的文件规范Protecting the File Specification 始终应将整个路径和文件名规范括在引号内，如以下示例所示。You should always enclose the entire path and file specification in quotation marks, as the following example shows. ```vb ID = Shell("""C:\Program Files\display.exe"" -a -q", , True, 100000) ``` 每对相邻两个双引号 (`" "`) 在字符串文本解释为一个双引号字符在字符串中。Each pair of adjacent double quotation marks (`" "`) within the string literal is interpreted as one double quotation character in the string. 因此，前面的示例中显示的下列字符串`Shell`函数：Therefore, the preceding example presents the following string to the `Shell` function: ```console "C:\Program Files\display.exe" -a -q ``` 如果您没有用引号括起来的路径，Windows 将查找名为的文件`Program.exe`在 C:\ 目录中，而不是`display.exe`C:\Program Files 目录中。If you did not have the path enclosed in quotation marks, Windows would look for a file called `Program.exe` in the C:\ directory, instead of `display.exe` in the C:\Program Files directory. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果不要将路径和文件名规范括在引号中，如果该文件名或路径节点中包含空格则安全风险。If you do not enclose the path and file specification in quotation marks, there is a security risk if the file name or a path node contains spaces. 在前面的示例中，路径节点`\Program Files`中包含空格。In the preceding example, the path node `\Program Files` includes a space. 如果规范未在单引号中，名为的程序内`Program.exe`已安装在 c:\\，例如由非法篡改，Windows 将执行它而不是`display.exe`。If the specification were not inside quotation marks and a program named `Program.exe` had been installed in C:\\, for example by illicit tampering, Windows would execute it instead of `display.exe`. > [!IMPORTANT] > `Shell`函数需要非托管的代码的权限，这可能会影响在部分信任情况下执行。The `Shell` function requires unmanaged code permission, which might affect its execution in partial-trust situations. 有关详细信息，请参阅并[代码访问权限](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675)。For more information, see and [Code Access Permissions](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e5ae402f-6dda-4732-bbe8-77296630f675). ## Examples 下面的示例使用`Shell`函数运行用户指定的应用程序。The following example uses the `Shell` function to run an application specified by the user. 指定为第二个参数将应用程序打开在正常大小，使其具有焦点。Specifying as the second argument opens the application in normal size and gives it the focus. remarks.format: ## Remarks 自变量提供给`VarExpr`成对的表达式和值组成。The argument supplied to `VarExpr` consists of paired expressions and values. `Switch`函数计算奇数表达式，从最低到最高的索引，在`VarExpr`，并返回与第一个表达式的计算结果为关联的偶数值`True`。The `Switch` function evaluates the odd-numbered expressions from lowest to highest index in `VarExpr`, and returns the even-numbered value associated with the first expression that evaluates to `True`. 例如，如果`VarExpr(0)`是`True`，`Switch`返回`VarExpr(1)`，并且如果`VarExpr(0)`是`False`但`VarExpr(2)`是`True`，`Switch`返回`VarExpr(3)`，依次类推。For example, if `VarExpr(0)` is `True`, `Switch` returns `VarExpr(1)`, and if `VarExpr(0)` is `False` but `VarExpr(2)` is `True`, `Switch` returns `VarExpr(3)`, and so on. 如果未提供`VarExpr`参数，`Switch`返回`Nothing`。If you do not supply the `VarExpr` argument, `Switch` returns `Nothing`. > [!NOTE] > 参数列表中的表达式可以包括函数调用。The expressions in the argument list can include function calls. 作为准备为调用的参数列表的一部分`Switch`，Visual Basic 编译器在每个表达式中调用的每个函数。As part of preparing the argument list for the call to `Switch`, the Visual Basic compiler calls every function in every expression. 这意味着您不能依赖于特定函数参数列表中前面的表达式为时未调用`True`。This means that you cannot rely on a particular function not being called if an expression earlier in the argument list is `True`. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`Switch`函数以返回与匹配的城市名称的语言的名称。The following example uses the `Switch` function to return the name of a language that matches the name of a city. 该配置要求`Option Strict`是`Off`。It requires that `Option Strict` be `Off`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#48)] 因为命名空间还包含一个名为类，调用`Switch`函数必须使用限定命名空间。Because the namespace also contains a class called , a call to the `Switch` function must be qualified with the namespace.
